name: 戶外領導規劃與執行
description: This course aims to cultivate students' leadership and guidance ability in outdoor and adventurous activities. Through the introduction of leadership-related theory and actual participation in the outdoor and adventurous activities, students can develop the potential learning outcomes and obtain advanced knowledge and skills regarding leadership of outdoor activities.
goals: Develop professional theoretical knowledge of outdoor leadership planning
Understand outdoor leadership theory and be able to apply it in practice
Understand the value of outdoors and reflect on the current issues and actual experiences
The promotion and persistence of professional value and rationale
